["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"如需克隆 GNU C Library 代码，使用"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若要将 mirror 加入已有代码库，可在已有仓库中运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote add mirror {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将默认上游设置为镜像站"}]]}]

meta.title: GNU C Library (glibc) Git 镜像使用帮助
